text:
The job got a little tricker with the need to loop for 2 columns instead of just the 1. but this was pretty simple in the end.

`office_info_map[item.language + " " + item.booking_office] = item;`

Then pulling to html with a matching var set

`{% set market_content = markets.map[contact.language + " " + contact.booking_office_booking_] %}`
The challenge now is understanding how text columns differ to select columns. I can then switch to using these instead

I'm all good thank you. This has expanded my knowledge again - so thanks. Turns out my issues is common with sliders in Tabs.  I needed to display the hidden tabs with CSS so that the slider could get the right height for images on page load.  Fixed now AND I gained how I can add random ID's which is very useful. Thanks guys
